decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures like Guide of Souls and Amped Raptor, backed up by removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge. The deck also utilizes powerful enchantments like Arena of Glory and Static Prison to control the board and protect its creatures. The inclusion of cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury adds additional threats and versatility to the deck's game plan. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive strategy while also providing flexibility in casting spells.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on using a combination of aggressive creatures like Amped Raptor and Orcish Bowmasters along with burn spells like Galvanic Discharge to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The inclusion of Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provides additional support for the aggressive strategy, while cards like Thoughtseize and Static Prison help to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and relentless offense, utilizing a mix of creatures and burn spells to secure victory.

The key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells, while utilizing the companion Jegantha, the Wellspring for additional value. The deck focuses on a mix of creature types and colors to maximize the power of Tribal Flames and Leyline of the Guildpact. With efficient removal like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial, as well as big threats like Scion of Draco and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, this aggro deck aims to quickly pressure the opponent and close out the game before they can stabilize.

The deck focuses on using the Amulet of Vigor to generate extra mana and quickly ramp into Primeval Titan. The main goal is to tutor for and play Urza's Saga to search for key lands such as Gruul Turf, Simic Growth Chamber, and bounce lands to quickly generate mana. Once Primeval Titan is in play, the deck aims to search for lands like Vesuva and Boseiju, Who Endures to further push the combo and generate more advantage. The deck also utilizes cards like Explore and Arboreal Grazer to further accelerate its game plan and maintain consistency.

This deck focuses on utilizing the powerful combo of Underworld Breach, Emry, Lurker of the Loch, and Urza's Saga to generate infinite mana and cards, ultimately winning the game with Thassa's Oracle. The deck includes cards that help enable the combo such as Mishra's Bauble and Mox Amber, as well as disruption in the form of Spell Snare and Unholy Heat. The inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and the ability to dig for combo pieces. Grinding Station can be used as an alternative win condition if needed.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the combo pieces needed to win the game without relying on lands. It utilizes cards like Goblin Charbelcher and Hydroelectric Specimen to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck also includes counterspells and card draw to help protect the combo and find the necessary pieces. By using cards like Lotus Bloom and Whir of Invention, the deck can quickly set up a winning board state. Overall, the strategy revolves around efficient combo pieces and powerful spells to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The main concept of this Modern Combo Dredge deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with cards like Narcomoeba, Golgari Thug, and Stinkweed Imp using cards like Tome Scour, Cathartic Reunion, and Otherworldly Gaze. By leveraging the Dredge mechanic, you can bring back powerful creatures like Prized Amalgam and Silversmote Ghoul from your graveyard to overwhelm your opponent. Additionally, cards like Ox of Agonas and Conflagrate provide additional utility and ways to close out the game, all while using lands like Polluted Delta and Cephalid Coliseum to fuel your graveyard manipulation.

The deck focuses on cycling through cards to fill the graveyard and then casting Living End to reanimate a board full of powerful creatures. It utilizes cards like Street Wraith and Curator of Mysteries to cycle through the deck quickly, while also including disruption spells like Force of Negation and Subtlety to control the game. The deck aims to set up a powerful board state with creatures like Endurance and Waker of Waves, overwhelming the opponent with a combo finish.

The Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful burn spells. It aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent, using cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Amped Raptor to push damage through, while also using cards like Lightning Bolt and Goblin Bombardment to finish off the opponent or deal with threats. The deck also includes some control elements like Static Prison to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect its own creatures.

The deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly, primarily through rituals and mana-producing spells, in order to cast multiple spells in a single turn and overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes combo pieces like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Ruby Medallion to reduce the cost of spells and enable explosive turns. The inclusion of Past in Flames and Wish cards help to recur important spells and find key combo pieces. The deck aims to win the game by chaining together spells and generating a massive amount of damage, making it difficult for opponents to keep up.
